description: Clickteam Fusion is an app-creation platform that developers can use to develop simple video games and other applications. Fusion applications are saved in MFA files.

Commonly, developers save multiple Fusion applications, or multiple versions of the same application, within MFW (Clickteam Fusion Project) files. MFW files do not contain any source code. Instead, they contain references to each of the MFA files a project includes.
NOTE: Clickteam Fusion replaced the Multimedia Fusion and The Games Factory programs, which also supported the MFA format (Multimedia Fusion Application).
